channel.title: Devblog of Djugei
channel.description: Some fun ideas and insights, mainly around rust

item.title: Why I like programming for #![no_std] in Rust (even without embedded)
item.description: I noticed that I quite enjoy writing libraries that support no_std environments, even though I myself don't even work on embedded.

item.title: Introduction to my Blog
item.description: This blog will mainly contain release announcements for my various projects, some deep dives into designs or optimizations I did. Also some opinions sometimes.

item.title: Dumbnet version 0.1.0 released
item.description: Mostly for fun I developed a small artificial neural network library that does all its work on the stack, no operating system or allocator needed.

item.title: Treelike version 0.2.0 released
item.description: Treelike is an abstraction over Trees, kinda like Iterator for lists. Is also no_std by default.
